Recommendations.Title: Special Needs Learning Support Assistants - Garratt Park School

Recommendations.Reasoning: The job description mentions the need to become familiar with school policies, which suggests this is a position aimed at providing support for students

raw_result.Analysis Notes: Out of the 10 job listings, five results were chosen based on relevance to council customer information needs involving families and students. The remaining jobs focused on fostering allowances and school management positions that are likely outside the scope of council customer support.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The provided job listings present an opportunity for families looking for special educational needs support, as well as opportunities in food services within schools.
